properties.description:
No approval is required. Get started using our APIs now!

Subscribers have access to all Public IATI APIs with the following limits:
- Rate Limit: 5 API requests/60 seconds
- Quota: 100 API requests/7 days 

When you are ready to do more intensive testing or take an integration live, please request a Full Access subscription.

IATI Technical Team approval is required. 

Subscribers have full access to all Public IATI APIs with the following limits:
- Rate Limit: 100 API requests/60 seconds
- Quota: 10,000 API requests/7 days
    - Only successful HTTP response codes (200 - 399) are counted towards the quota.

If you reach the limit and believe you have a use case for higher limits, please contact support@iatistandard.org

Granted by IATI Technical Team manually on a temporary, as-needed basis for application testing and may be revoked at any time to preserve service levels for all users.

If you reach the limit and believe you have a use case for higher limits, please contact support@iatistandard.org
